ch.phonon.temview

Class TemAdapterScaleTreatment

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.phonon.temview.TemAdapterScaleTreatment

  • public class TemAdapterScaleTreatment
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the DrawableScaleReference movement in the TEMView based on the mouse input from the user. The scale can be transformed in several ways pressing the left, the center or the right grip. The new grip position has to be calculated as shown in the picture below:

    Author:
    phonon

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TemAdapterScaleTreatment(TEMView temview)
      This only constructor is used to initialize the class members.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void treatGripMovement(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Treats the situation, where one of the grips of the scale was pressed and are now active for moving.
      void treatGripReleased()
      This function needs to be called in the TEMAdapter, when the grip is released by the user input.
      void treatLeftGripPressed(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Treats the situation, where the left grip of the scale is pressed: picture coordinates or the grab position and the grip position is calculated and a corrective difference calculated between the grip and the grab position.
      void treatMiddleGripPressed(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Treats the situation, where the middle grip of the scale is pressed: picture coordinates or the grab position and the grip position is calculated and a corrective difference calculated between the grip and the grab position.
      void treatRightGripPressed(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Treats the situation, where the right grip of the scale is pressed: picture coordinates or the grab position and the grip position is calculated and a corrective difference calculated between the grip and the grab position.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TemAdapterScaleTreatment

        public TemAdapterScaleTreatment(TEMView temview)
        This only constructor is used to initialize the class members. The transfered scales reference delegates the functions to modify the active DrawableScaleReference location and orientation parameters.
        Parameters:
        temview -

      • treatLeftGripPressed

        public void treatLeftGripPressed(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        Treats the situation, where the left grip of the scale is pressed: picture coordinates or the grab position and the grip position is calculated and a corrective difference calculated between the grip and the grab position.
        Parameters:
        e -

      • treatGripMovement

        public void treatGripMovement(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        Treats the situation, where one of the grips of the scale was pressed and are now active for moving. The new grip position is recalculated and the state of the delegated DrawableScaleReference, that is member of the TEMView - the class constructor parameter - is updated. This function should be called after user scale movement in the TEMAdapter.
        Parameters:
        e -

      • treatGripReleased

        public void treatGripReleased()
        This function needs to be called in the TEMAdapter, when the grip is released by the user input. After releasing the grip states are reinitialized.
